description: Performs a rollback of a transaction. Rolling back a transaction cancels its changes.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Aurora Serverless DB cluster.

parameters.name: secretArn
parameters.description: The name or ARN of the secret that enables access to the DB cluster.

parameters.name: transactionId
parameters.description: The identifier of the transaction to roll back.

nested_items.name: transactionStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the rollback operation.
